author: mariusvanderwijden
content: <@425572898787426305> Should the EL sanity check that the index of the withdrawals are monotonically increasing or is that something that the CL will verify?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: I updated the test vectors for withdrawals on the cl, had a big issue with them and they were completely wrong, thanks <@792822129019584562> for noticing: https://hackmd.io/PqZgMpnkSWCWv5joJoFymQ

author: m.kalinin
content: Withdrawal indexes are verified by CL, there is no need for EL to do this work

author: g11tech
content: lodestar can successfully interop with geth over the new apis (only caveat is geth using "recipient" than "address" for the execution address specification) which i guess will be resolved in the next build
